entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
